programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.

programme.title: Sky
programme.desc: Premiere. A French woman embarks on a life-changing trip through the California desert after a dramatic blow-up with her husband. Drama, starring Diane Kruger and Norman Reedus.

programme.title: The Great Wall: Special
programme.desc: A look at the epic action adventure starring Matt Damon, Pedro Pascal and Willem Dafoe.

programme.title: Growing Up Smith
programme.desc: Premiere. After his family moves to America in 1979, a 10-year-old Indian boy falls head-over-heels for the girl next door. Comedy, starring Jason Lee, Anjul Nigam and Roni Akurati.

programme.title: Ready Player One: Special
programme.desc: A look at Steven Spielberg's sci-fi adventure based on Ernest Cline's book, starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke and Ben Mendelsohn.

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Premiere. Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.

programme.title: Broken Vows
programme.desc: A troubled, charming man spirals into a rage after being rejected by the engaged woman he seduced during a one night stand. Thriller, starring Wes Bentley, Jaimie Alexander and Cam Gigandet.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Premiere. A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor.

programme.title: The Wizard - An American Wrestler
programme.desc: In 1980, a teenager escapes the unrest in Iran only to face more hostility in America, due to the hostage crisis. Determined to fit in, he joins the school's troubled wrestling team. Drama, starring George Kosturos, William Fichtner and Ali Afshar.

programme.desc: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for an annual festival, sisterhoods are rekindled and wild sides are rediscovered. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Book of Henry
programme.desc: A single mum sets out to rescue an abused girl using instructions from her genius son's notebook. Drama, starring Naomi Watts and Jacob Tremblay. Directed by Jurassic World's Colin Trevorrow.

programme.title: The Girl in the Book
programme.desc: A junior editor must confront difficult memories when she crosses paths with the writer who took advantage of her as a teenager. Drama, starring Emily VanCamp and Michael Nyqvist.

programme.title: The War of the Roses
programme.desc: Two students marry and go on to become a happy, affluent couple, but after several years, they decide to divorce. Neither of them is prepared to give up their luxurious house, turning their separation into a spiteful cycle of one-upmanship and humiliation. Black comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito, who also directed.

programme.title: GI Blues
programme.desc: A guitar-strumming soldier bets he can win the hardened heart of an unresponsive West German cabaret dancer. She rejects him when she learns about the wager, but by then he has already genuinely fallen in love with her. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Juliet Prowse, James Douglas and Robert Ivers. Songs include Blue Suede Shoes, Tonight Is So Right For Love and the title number.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: A naval nurse falls in love with a French plantation owner on an American-held island during the Second World War. However, dark secrets surface from his past and result in her having to leave the colony and embark on a perilous mission with the help of a US Navy officer. Romantic musical based on the Rodgers and Hammerstein Broadway show, with Mitzi Gaynor, Rossano Brazzi, John Kerr and Ray Walston.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: An airline pilot with a history of heavy drinking and drug use successfully lands a plane that suffers mechanical problems during a fierce storm, saving the lives of nearly everyone on board. While initially hailed as a hero, it later emerges that he was drunk at the time, raising questions about whether he may have contributed to the disaster rather than averted it. Drama, starring Denzel Washington and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Mum's List
programme.desc: A young father is left to pick up the pieces after his wife succumbs to breast cancer. Drama based on the book by St John Greene, starring Rafe Spall, Emilia Fox and Elaine Cassidy.

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: An airline pilot with a history of heavy drinking and drug use successfully lands a plane that suffers mechanical problems during a fierce storm, saving the lives of nearly everyone on board. While initially hailed as a hero, it later emerges that he was drunk at the time, raising questions about whether he may have contributed to the disaster rather than averted it. Drama, starring Denzel Washington and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her husband has died in a car crash - but the next day he turns out to be alive and well. As the past and the future blur into one, she finds herself living the days before and after the tragedy in seemingly random order and tries to find a way to prevent the accident from happening. Supernatural thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: A high-school dropout in the 1970s lands a job with a leading hardcore porn director, and is thrown into a strange world inhabited by bizarre characters - only to find fame and fortune come at a price. Drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Burt Reynolds, Julianne Moore, William H Macy, Heather Graham and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
programme.desc: Three women rent a luxurious New York apartment as part of a scheme to get their claws into wealthy husbands - but their plans become unstuck when all three start to fall for men with good hearts and empty pockets. Comedy, starring Betty Grable, Marilyn Monroe, Lauren Bacall, William Powell, Cameron Mitchell, David Wayne, Rory Calhoun and Fred Clark.

programme.title: My Feral Heart
programme.desc: Following his mother's death, Luke, a young man with Down's syndrome, moves into a care home. After sneaking out of the house to explore the countryside, he meets a young woman who gives him hope and purpose. Drama, starring Darren Kent, Steven Brandon, Suzanna Hamilton and Pixie Le Knot.

programme.title: An Affair to Remember
programme.desc: Love blossoms on the high seas for a playboy bachelor and a former nightclub singer during a transatlantic cruise. When the liner comes into dock at New York, they agree to wait for six months and then meet again at the Empire State Building, hoping to prove to each other their relationship is more than a shipboard affair. Romantic drama, with Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Cathleen Nesbitt, Richard Denning and Neva Patterson.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: A hard-working construction worker is forced to deal with life-shattering loss when his family are killed in a plane crash. Drama, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Scoot McNairy and Maggie Grace.

programme.title: Julie & Julia
programme.desc: Biopic telling the stories of revolutionary 1960s American chef Julia Child and modern-day housewife Julie Powell, who vows to master her heroine's most famous recipes in one year and maintain a blog about her experiences. Starring Meryl Streep, Amy Adams, Stanley Tucci, Chris Messina, Linda Emond and Helen Carey.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: The Verdict
programme.desc: A failed attorney takes on a medical case on behalf of the family of a woman left in a coma after an operation in a Catholic hospital. Hoping to earn his fee as fast as possible, he advises both sides to settle out of court. However, soon it becomes clear that the hospital is negligent, and he resolves to bring those responsible to justice. Sidney Lumet's drama, with Paul Newman, Charlotte Rampling and James Mason.

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A reclusive genius creates a boy but dies before completing him, leaving his brainchild with scissor-like blades in place of hands. A kindly woman from a nearby suburb takes pity on the lonely figure and welcomes him into her home. He quickly becomes a hit in the neighbourhood - but then his new friends start to turn against him. Tim Burton's fantasy, starring Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest and Vincent Price.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker: Unmasked Edition
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sado masochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. Extended version of the Fifty Shades of Grey sequel, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Rita Ora.

programme.title: Racing Hearts
programme.desc: A businessman travels to a small Belgian village on an unusual assignment. A wealthy Dubai sheikh he is trying to make a deal with has a passion for pigeon racing, and wants to own a famous champion bird. As the visitor tries to persuade the breeder to part with the creature, he falls for the man's granddaughter. Romantic drama, with Jamie Dornan, Charlotte De Bruyne and Anthony Head.(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, jazz musician Chet Baker battles drug addiction and struggles to launch a comeback. Drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Carmen Ejogo and Callum Keith Rennie.(n)

programme.title: To Sir, with Love
programme.desc: A black engineer takes a teaching job at a tough London school to make ends meet, and over the course of his difficult first term, struggles to gain the respect of his disruptive pupils. Drama, starring Sidney Poitier, Christian Roberts, Judy Geeson, Geoffrey Bayldon, Patricia Routledge, Christopher Chittell and Lulu.(n)

programme.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Sparks fly when a toy designer visiting Hong Kong gets talking to an expat American businessman. Romantic drama starring Jamie Chung and Bryan Greenberg.(n)

programme.title: Rules Don't Apply
programme.desc: An aspiring actress and an ambitious young driver fall for one another while working for eccentric billionaire Howard Hughes. Romantic comedy, written, directed by and starring Warren Beatty, with Lily Collins, Haley Bennett and Alden Ehrenreich.(n)

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Fact-based romantic drama based on the life of writer Karen Blixen, who, after relocating from Denmark to a farm in Nairobi for a marriage of convenience, embarked on a passionate and ill-fated love affair with an idealistic British adventurer. Starring Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Michael Kitchen, Klaus Maria Brandauer and Leslie Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.(n)

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, oversees the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as opposing sides clash in the face of huge change. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson and Manish Dayal.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, oversees the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as opposing sides clash in the face of huge change. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson and Manish Dayal.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two teenage friends are on the brink of going to different colleges, so decide to mark the event by going to a party where they hope to lose their virginity. However, they have promised to supply the booze for the event, a task that proves much harder than expected because they are under age. Unfortunately, when a friend steps in to help, the situation gets even worse. Comedy, starring Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse.

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: A reckless sports writer and his lawyer hit the highways in search of the American Dream, heading for the Nevada gambling capital in a convertible stocked with alcohol and drugs. Comedy, adapted by Terry Gilliam from Hunter S Thompson's book, starring Johnny Depp, Benicio Del Toro, Ellen Barkin, Christina Ricci and Tobey Maguire.

programme.title: Casual Encounters
programme.desc: A man who has been unceremoniously dumped by his girlfriend is persuaded by his friends to join a dating website and has a series of disastrous romantic encounters. He realises that he is actually in love with a work colleague - but by this point, he has acquired a string of embarrassing experiences that could jeopardise any hope he has with her. Comedy, starring Taran Killam and Brooklyn Decker.

programme.title: Rampage: Special
programme.desc: Preview of Dwayne Johnson's new big-screen adventure about a troop of intelligent gorillas tearing across North America, destroying everything in their path.

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: A lonely New Yorker is rescued from drowning by a mermaid, who falls in love with him and assumes human form so she can seek him out in Manhattan. He is soon equally smitten, and she resolves to keep her true nature a secret from him. However, an obsessive scientist suspects the truth and plans to prove it. Romantic fantasy comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah and John Candy.

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Two guys make a pact to lose their virginity before their senior prom, but things take an unexpected turn when one of them comes out of the closet. Comedy, starring Nicholas Braun, Hunter Cope and Dakota Johnson.

programme.title: How To Be A Latin Lover
programme.desc: An ageing Lothario finds his life thrown into turmoil when his wealthy older wife dumps him for a younger man. Comedy, starring Eugenio Derbez, Salma Hayek and Rob Lowe. In Spanish.

programme.title: The Love Guru
programme.desc: An eccentric spiritual adviser hopes to achieve fame and fortune for his talents. The chance presents itself when a star ice hockey player is reduced to a nervous wreck when his wife leaves him, and the team owner hires the guru to reunite the couple. Comedy, starring Mike Myers, Jessica Alba, Justin Timberlake and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: Premiere. Straight-laced suburbanite couple Scott and Kate Johansen set up an illegal casino when their daughter's scholarship falls through. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler and Jason Mantzoukas.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: The chauvinistic host of a top-rated American news programme in 1970s San Diego fights for his status and job security when both are threatened by the arrival of an ambitious female reporter, whose determination to become a newsreader leads to a bitter battle of the sexes. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Fred Willard and Steve Carell.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: Premiere. Straight-laced suburbanite couple Scott and Kate Johansen set up an illegal casino when their daughter's scholarship falls through. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler and Jason Mantzoukas.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: The chauvinistic host of a top-rated American news programme in 1970s San Diego fights for his status and job security when both are threatened by the arrival of an ambitious female reporter, whose determination to become a newsreader leads to a bitter battle of the sexes. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Fred Willard and Steve Carell.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A Nascar racing champion has everything he could want - until an arrogant French rival seizes the title from him, and his wife runs off with his best friend. Forced to move back in with his mother, the downhearted driver turns to his estranged father for help rebuilding his shattered self-confidence. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen.

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: A singer is transformed from naive country boy to the greatest rock 'n' roll legend of all time - with the traditional stand-bys of sex, drugs, failed marriages, falls from grace, spectacular comebacks and the love of a good woman along the way. Comedy spoof of music biopics, starring John C Reilly, Jenna Fischer and Raymond J Barry, and featuring appearances from Jack Black and Jack White.

programme.title: White Island
programme.desc: A former DJ trying to live a normal life is dragged back into the seductive, drug-fuelled world of Ibiza nightclubs. Comedy, starring Lyndon Ogbourne, Billy Zane and Billy Boyd.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A by-the-book Los Angeles cop is paired with a laidback new partner to investigate the nefarious activities of a TV evangelist and a pornographic-magazine baron suspected of operating a criminal cult. Comedy spoof of the 1950s TV series, starring Dan Aykroyd, Tom Hanks, Christopher Plummer and the original show's star Harry Morgan.

programme.title: The Confirmation
programme.desc: When his tools are stolen, a divorced, down-on-his-luck handyman and his young son attempt to track down the culprits. Comedy, starring Clive Owen, Jaeden Lieberher and Maria Bello.

programme.title: Don't Think Twice
programme.desc: Turmoil strikes a New York improv troupe when one member leaves to star in a Saturday Night Live-style TV show. Comedy, starring Keegan-Michael Key and Gillian Jacobs.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two black male FBI agents pose as white female debutantes in the line of duty, donning full drag and very heavy make-up in an audacious bid to infiltrate a kidnapping ring. Comedy, starring brothers Shawn and Marlon Wayans, with Jaime King and Frankie Faison.

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: A habitual thief and his cop wife are distraught to discover they cannot have children, so set out to kidnap one of five babies born to a local tycoon. However, a relentless bounty hunter is soon on their trail, while two escaped convicts hope to get a reward for returning the child. Coen brothers comedy, starring Nicolas Cage, Holly Hunter, John Goodman and Frances McDormand.

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Superficial Hal is only interested in dating physically perfect women, but his outlook is changed when a self-help guru hypnotises him into seeing inner beauty - and he ends up falling for a spirited overweight woman. However, when the hypnosis wears off he struggles to remember that looks are not everything. Farrelly Brothers comedy, starring Gwyneth Paltrow, Jack Black, Jason Alexander and Joe Viterelli.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two black male FBI agents pose as white female debutantes in the line of duty, donning full drag and very heavy make-up in an audacious bid to infiltrate a kidnapping ring. Comedy, starring brothers Shawn and Marlon Wayans, with Jaime King and Frankie Faison.

programme.title: Little Man
programme.desc: A tiny baby-faced jewel thief tries to steal a priceless diamond for a gangster, only for it to end up in the home of a childless and gullible suburban couple. In a bid to get it back, the crook masquerades as an abandoned child to get himself adopted as their baby son - but comes to regret the ruse when he has to suffer nappy changes and being breastfed. Comedy, with Marlon and Shawn Wayans, Kerry Washington and Tracy Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Four friends stuck in a rut decide to celebrate one of their birthdays in style, but it isn't long before things spiral out of control. Comedy, starring Grace Helbig, Mamrie Hart and Hannah Hart.(n)

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: A Californian detective investigating the murder of a local man by drug smugglers has only one witness to help him solve the case - the large, smelly dog that belonged to the victim, which is about to turn the detective's well-ordered existence into chaos. Family comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham and Craig T Nelson.(n)

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: An unreliable but good-natured slob is called upon to look after his trouble-making nephew and nieces while their parents are away - and what starts as a disaster soon changes for the better as the unlikely babysitter gets to grips with the finer points of being a responsible adult. Family comedy, starring John Candy, Macaulay Culkin, Jean Kelly, Gaby Hoffman, Amy Madigan and Laurie Metcalf.(n)

programme.title: Our Man Flint
programme.desc: The world is rocked by a series of mysterious ecological disasters, while top secret agents from all nations are being murdered. Super-cool American spy Derek Flint is soon on the case, and discovers a fiendish organisation using a weather-controlling machine to hold the world to ransom. Comedy adventure, with James Coburn, Lee J Cobb and Gina Golan.(n)

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: A thirtysomething man has no intention of leaving the family home, so his exasperated parents respond by hiring a woman who earns her living enticing stay-at-home men to fall in love with her and then encouraging them to fly the nest. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Matthew McConaughey, Kathy Bates and Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Chips: Law and Disorder
programme.desc: A maverick FBI agent working undercover in the California Highway Patrol is partnered with a complete rookie. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dax Shepard, Michael Pena and Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: A teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the school's dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: A teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the school's dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Chips: Law and Disorder
programme.desc: A maverick FBI agent working undercover in the California Highway Patrol is partnered with a complete rookie. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dax Shepard, Michael Pena and Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Conjoined twins head for the bright lights of Hollywood, where one of them lands a role on a TV show starring alongside Cher - but his dreams of acting success are hampered by his brother's determination to search for the woman he has been romancing online. Comedy from the Farrelly brothers, starring Matt Damon and Greg Kinnear, and featuring cameo appearances by Meryl Streep and Jack Nicholson as themselves.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
programme.desc: A crazed CIA agent based in Mexico learns of a conspiracy involving a drug baron and a military general to assassinate the president. He finds the perfect man to prevent the coup in the shape of a legendary gunslinger, who is seeking revenge on the general for murdering his wife. Action thriller, concluding Robert Rodriguez's El Mariachi trilogy, starring Antonio Banderas, Johnny Depp, Willem Dafoe, Mickey Rourke and Salma Hayek.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Three highly skilled fighter pilots are less than thrilled when a new computer with artificial intelligence is brought in to assist in flying a state-of-the-art jet. However, the trio are left to pick up the pieces when the machine is struck by lightning and begins to malfunction, leading to a chaotic battle to stop the jet from starting an all-out war. Action adventure, starring Jamie Foxx, Jessica Biel and Josh Lucas.

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle.

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa.

programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane.

To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott.

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A cop returns to duty after being injured in an incident that led to the death of his partner. On his first day back, he discovers evidence of corruption among his colleagues. He soon finds himself trapped inside his own precinct and fighting for survival against crooked cops determined to keep their misdeeds a secret. Action thriller sequel, starring Jonathan Good and Roger R Cross.

programme.title: Rampage: Special
programme.desc: Preview of Dwayne Johnson's new big-screen adventure about a troop of intelligent gorillas tearing across North America, destroying everything in their path.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: A squad of South Korean soldiers sent to infiltrate their northern neighbours during the crucial Battle of Incheon. Wartime drama, starring Lee Jung-jae and Liam Neeson.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: A respected fighter in China at the turn of the 20th century returns from self-imposed exile with the intention of passing on his knowledge. Wary of his status as a national hero, foreign powers based in China challenge him to enter a tournament so their own champions can destroy him. Martial arts adventure, based on a true story, starring Jet Li and Shido Nakamura. In Mandarin, Japanese and English.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: A squad of South Korean soldiers sent to infiltrate their northern neighbours during the crucial Battle of Incheon. Wartime drama, starring Lee Jung-jae and Liam Neeson.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: A respected fighter in China at the turn of the 20th century returns from self-imposed exile with the intention of passing on his knowledge. Wary of his status as a national hero, foreign powers based in China challenge him to enter a tournament so their own champions can destroy him. Martial arts adventure, based on a true story, starring Jet Li and Shido Nakamura. In Mandarin, Japanese and English.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the other's identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bay's action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle.(n)

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: A maverick Canadian Mountie poses as a convict to smash a sinister plot involving the sale of human organs, only to find himself facing a desperate fight for survival. Thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Robert Guillaume and Cynthia Gibb.(n)

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: The bungling Inspector Clouseau is sent to investigate a high-profile murder case. All the clues point to a maid being the guilty party, but the accident-prone detective is instantly smitten with her, and devotes his efforts to proving her innocence - despite all evidence to the contrary. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers, Elke Sommer, George Sanders and Herbert Lom.(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: A truck driver accepts a challenge to deliver a consignment of beer to a party. He claims he can make the 900-mile round trip in just 28 hours, but a pompous sheriff is determined to stop him in his tracks, not least because his prospective daughter-in-law has deserted his son and hitched a ride with the unlikely hero. Comedy, starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Sally Field and Jerry Reed.(n)

programme.title: Premium Rush
programme.desc: A Manhattan bike messenger takes an assignment to deliver a mysterious package across the city. The simple task turns into a fight for survival when he finds there is someone following him, who is willing to kill to get his hands on the delivery's contents. Thriller, starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Michael Shannon and Dania Ramirez.(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: A US Air Force veteran ejects his co-pilot from their Stealth bomber in a plan to steal the plane's cargo of nuclear warheads. He uses the weapons to extort money from the American government by threatening to detonate one in a major city. Action thriller, starring John Travolta, Christian Slater, Samantha Mathis and Delroy Lindo.(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: A truck driver accepts a challenge to deliver a consignment of beer to a party. He claims he can make the 900-mile round trip in just 28 hours, but a pompous sheriff is determined to stop him in his tracks, not least because his prospective daughter-in-law has deserted his son and hitched a ride with the unlikely hero. Comedy, starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Sally Field and Jerry Reed.(n)

programme.title: Willow
programme.desc: A farmer with dreams of becoming a wizard finds an abandoned baby, who is destined to bring about the downfall of an evil queen. The wicked tyrant's minions have been sent to kill the child before she can fulfil the prophecy, and it falls to the would-be sorcerer to protect her, with the aid of a rogue warrior. Fantasy adventure, starring Warwick Davis and Val Kilmer.(n)

programme.title: Premium Rush
programme.desc: A Manhattan bike messenger takes an assignment to deliver a mysterious package across the city. The simple task turns into a fight for survival when he finds there is someone following him, who is willing to kill to get his hands on the delivery's contents. Thriller, starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Michael Shannon and Dania Ramirez.(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Maverick cop Dirty Harry Callahan antagonises his superiors once more in his pursuit of a vigilante group responsible for murdering the city's most wanted criminals. However, he is unaware that the killers are some of his fellow officers - and are prepared to see him dead to keep their secret safe. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan, David Soul and Robert Urich.

programme.title: Don't Look Now
programme.desc: A couple trying to get over the death of their daughter take a trip to Venice, where they are shocked by a psychic's claim that the child is trying to contact them. Although the wife believes her story, the husband remains sceptical - until he begins to be troubled by spectral visions of his own. Nicholas Roeg's supernatural thriller based on Daphne du Maurier's short story, with Donald Sutherland and Julie Christie.

programme.title: Heaven Knows, Mr Allison
programme.desc: A US marine corporal stationed on a South Pacific island and a novice nun on a mission are forced into the hills when Japanese forces arrive and set up military bases during the Second World War. Before long the pair develop strong emotional ties, but in resisting their feelings for each other the relationship becomes one of deep mutual respect. Romantic drama, written and directed by John Huston, with Robert Mitchum and Deborah Kerr.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: The leader of a gang of bandits enslaves all the men from a Mexican village while maddened with grief over the death of his son. However, one of his hostages is a survivor from the original team of gunfighters, and his wife persuades his two remaining companions to form a new band of heroes and mount a rescue mission. Western sequel, starring Yul Brynner, Robert Fuller and Warren Oates.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg.

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Hapless Sonny and his sidekick Sal have a plan to rob a Brooklyn bank. The novice crooks thought they would be in and out in 10 minutes, but instead find themselves stuck in an ongoing hostage situation, with the police and the media laying siege to the bank. Sidney Lumet's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, John Cazale and Charles Durning.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: An idealistic undercover cop in 1960s New York is ostracised by his fellow officers for his refusal to take bribes. Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph.

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Hapless Sonny and his sidekick Sal have a plan to rob a Brooklyn bank. The novice crooks thought they would be in and out in 10 minutes, but instead find themselves stuck in an ongoing hostage situation, with the police and the media laying siege to the bank. Sidney Lumet's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, John Cazale and Charles Durning.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
programme.desc: Retired bank robber John Doherty escapes a gunman with the aid of a young car thief, and together they go in search of the loot from the former crook's last job. When they discover the stash is missing - and John's thuggish old partners are also looking for it - the pair decide to do a repeat robbery. Comedy drama, starring Clint Eastwood, Jeff Bridges, George Kennedy and Geoffrey Lewis.

programme.title: The Ox-Bow Incident
programme.desc: Cowboys intervene in a bid to prevent the lynching of three men accused of murdering a rancher and stealing his cattle. Western drama, starring Henry Fonda, Henry Morgan and Anthony Quinn.

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: Two students at Harvard University fall in love, but their romance is fated to be cut tragically short by the discovery that one of them has a terminal illness. Romantic drama, starring Ali MacGraw, Ryan O'Neal and Ray Milland.

programme.title: Guns of the Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Surviving gunslinger Chris is hired by Mexican revolutionaries to rescue their leader from a military prison. After assembling a crack team including a knife-fighting expert and a firearms aficionado, the group embarks on its mission - but underestimates the depths to which its enemies will sink. Second sequel to the Western, starring George Kennedy, James Whitmore, Monte Markham, Joe Don Baker and Reni Santoni.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: The relationship between the powerful King of Siam and a widowed English schoolteacher, recruited to tutor his wives and many children, begins with restrained hostility - but gradually gives way to more tender feelings. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Deborah Kerr, Yul Brynner, Rita Moreno, Martin Benson and Terry Saunders.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Homicidal madman Michael Myers escapes from a mental institution 15 years after murdering his sister, and goes on a killing spree in his home town. Although a psychiatrist is quickly on his trail in a bid to stop the loss of more lives, a shy teenage girl babysitting for her neighbour is unaware of the grisly fate in store for her. John Carpenter's horror, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Donald Pleasence, Nick Castle and PJ Soles.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: Hell Is for Heroes
programme.desc: A rebellious soldier defies orders to lead two men on a secret attack on a German pillbox, but his mission fails and the other two soldiers are killed. Court-martialled for his actions, he remains convinced his plan was sound and ignores the sentence to make a second attempt at destroying the emplacement. Second World War adventure, with Steve McQueen, James Coburn and Bobby Darin.(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Show on Earth
programme.desc: A circus owner hires a celebrated trapeze artist to perform with his girlfriend as the star attraction - leading to bitter rivalry in the air and sexual tension on the ground. Meanwhile, a clown tries to keep his past a secret, and racketeers prepare to muscle in on the concessions. Cecil B DeMille's Oscar-winning drama, starring Charlton Heston, Cornel Wilde, Betty Hutton and James Stewart.(n)

programme.title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
programme.desc: A reckless singing pilot joins a friend in Hawaii, where they plan to go into business together running chartered helicopter flights. However, his irresponsible nature, tangled love life and dangerous flying threaten to ruin their enterprise. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, James Shigeta and Suzanna Leigh.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride
programme.desc: The one-time leader of the gunslinging band, now a marshal, turns down an old ally's call for help in dealing with a gang of Mexican bandits. However, when the desperados kill his friend and his own wife, the lawman puts together a new team and sets out to take revenge. Western sequel, with Lee Van Cleef, Stefanie Powers, Mariette Hartley and Michael Callan.(n)

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: After witnessing a mob hit in Chicago, two male jazz musicians don drag and hide out with an all-girl band to evade the gangsters pursuing them. However, the pair struggle to disguise their attraction for the beautiful lead singer - while one of them catches the eye of a smitten millionaire. Billy Wilder's classic romantic comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Tony Curtis and Marilyn Monroe.(n)

programme.title: Chariots of Fire
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama based on the true story of British runners Eric Liddell and Harold Abrahams, going for gold at the 1924 Olympics in Paris. The two athletes are driven by very different impulses - Liddell is inspired by his devout Christian faith, while Abrahams hopes to triumph over the anti-Semitism he has endured all his life. Starring Ian Charleson, Ben Cross, Nigel Havers, John Gielgud and Ian Holm. Vangelis provides the soundtrack.(n)

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A lowly insurance clerk tries to curry favour with his seedy manager by lending him his flat for his extramarital flings. But the clerk soon grows wise to the nastiness of corporate ethics and infidelity when his heartless boss seduces the elevator girl, whom he has always loved from afar. Oscar-winning comedy drama, directed by Billy Wilder and starring Jack Lemmon, Fred MacMurray and Shirley MacLaine.(n)

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks' musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid.(n)

programme.title: The Odd Couple
programme.desc: Fastidious divorcee Felix moves in with slovenly sports writer Oscar and proceeds to clean up his chaotically untidy apartment, leading to all manner of domestic discord. Comedy based on Neil Simon's stage play, starring Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, John Fiedler, Herb Edelman and David Sheiner.(n)

programme.title: Chariots of Fire
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama based on the true story of British runners Eric Liddell and Harold Abrahams, going for gold at the 1924 Olympics in Paris. The two athletes are driven by very different impulses - Liddell is inspired by his devout Christian faith, while Abrahams hopes to triumph over the anti-Semitism he has endured all his life. Starring Ian Charleson, Ben Cross, Nigel Havers, John Gielgud and Ian Holm. Vangelis provides the soundtrack.(n)

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: Two tough New York cops use unorthodox methods to try to break an international drug ring. When their information leads them to place a candy store under surveillance, they discover the owners are the American agents for a French kingpin planning to ship millions of dollars worth of heroin into the US. Oscar-winning fact-based thriller, starring Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey and Tony Lo Bianco.(n)

programme.title: Mulan II
programme.desc: The warrior heroine is assigned as a bodyguard to three princesses by the emperor of China. When she learns the girls are to be forced into marriage, she decides to help them escape - jeopardising her relationship with her fiance, who remains loyal to the emperor. Disney animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Ming-Na and Lucy Liu.

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.

programme.title: Piglet's Big Movie
programme.desc: The plucky porker is upset when his friends tell him he is too small to come honey-harvesting with them, so he embarks on an adventure of his own - and it is not long before his pals start to miss him and realise just how important he is. Animation, featuring the voices of John Fiedler, Jim Cummings and Andre Stojka.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: Muppet Treasure Island
programme.desc: A youngster finds a treasure map and joins an expedition searching for a famous buccaneer's lost treasure on an unexplored island. However, their mission falls foul of a band of pirates hiding out among the crew. Musical comedy based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders and Kevin Bishop alongside the puppet characters.

programme.title: Inner Workings
programme.desc: Award winning animated Disney short that brings to life the constant internal struggle between head and heart.

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: Constantly outshined and outraced by a fleet of hi-tech rookies, former champ Lightning McQueen must find a new way to win. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: A battle-hardened military veteran fails to protect a government scientist from assassins. He is assigned to safeguard the dead boffin's family in case the killers come after the top-secret technology in his home, but finds looking after kids proves far tougher than taking on hitmen. Family comedy, starring Vin Diesel and Lauren Graham.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The son of Zeus, king of the Greek gods, is sent to Earth to be raised as a human. When he learns of his immortal heritage, he discovers he can only reclaim his position among the gods by becoming a true hero, so he embarks on a series of adventures and battles fearsome monsters to prove his worth. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tate Donovan, Danny DeVito, James Woods and Rip Torn.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: Constantly outshined and outraced by a fleet of hi-tech rookies, former champ Lightning McQueen must find a new way to win. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A buccaneer and a blacksmith commandeer a British ship and set sail in pursuit of a pirate captain who has kidnapped a colonial governor's daughter. However, their quarry and his crew are under a curse that turns them into living skeletons - and makes them impossible to kill. Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Muppet Treasure Island
programme.desc: A youngster finds a treasure map and joins an expedition searching for a famous buccaneer's lost treasure on an unexplored island. However, their mission falls foul of a band of pirates hiding out among the crew. Musical comedy based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders and Kevin Bishop alongside the puppet characters.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A buccaneer and a blacksmith commandeer a British ship and set sail in pursuit of a pirate captain who has kidnapped a colonial governor's daughter. However, their quarry and his crew are under a curse that turns them into living skeletons - and makes them impossible to kill. Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: The News Boys
programme.desc: Newspaper delivery boys in 19th-century New York rely on their meagre earnings to support their impoverished families. When media mogul Joseph Pulitzer raises his prices, threatening the livelihoods of the youngsters, they organise into a union to force him to put people's lives ahead of his own profits. Fact-based musical, starring Robert Duvall, Christian Bale and Ann-Margret.

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.

programme.title: Fantasia 2000
programme.desc: Animated family comedy. A continuation of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.

Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: For the Birds
programme.desc: Animated short film from Pixar about birds perched on a telephone wire that do not take kindly to a large, goofy newcomer on their territory, and despite his best efforts to be friendly, they try and get rid of him.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Wily rogue Captain Jack Sparrow finds an old debt coming back to haunt him. Years before, he sold his soul to the legendary Davy Jones, who has now risen from the depths of the ocean to collect what he is owed - with a giant sea monster at his command. Meanwhile, ruthless trader Lord Beckett is intent on seizing control of the Caribbean, and sets out to turn Jack and his allies against one another. Swashbuckling adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Fantasia 2000
programme.desc: Animated family comedy. A continuation of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

programme.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
programme.desc: Anthology of animated tales based on AA Milne's stories, following a series of exploits of the dim-witted bear and his collection of unusual friends. With the voices of Sterling Holloway, Paul Winchell, Sebastian Cabot and Junius Matthews.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Wily rogue Captain Jack Sparrow finds an old debt coming back to haunt him. Years before, he sold his soul to the legendary Davy Jones, who has now risen from the depths of the ocean to collect what he is owed - with a giant sea monster at his command. Meanwhile, ruthless trader Lord Beckett is intent on seizing control of the Caribbean, and sets out to turn Jack and his allies against one another. Swashbuckling adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
programme.desc: A noble archer attends a royal contest, but on the way home his father is murdered by henchmen of the wicked King John. He assumes the life of an outlaw, gathering a band of followers in Sherwood Forest and fighting to bring justice to the over-taxed poor and avenge his father's death. Adventure, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch.(n)

programme.title: Tarzan II
programme.desc: Growing up in the jungle, the young Tarzan realises he is not quite the same as his simian siblings, and decides to run away. He soon comes across a group of gorillas who send him up a mysterious mountain, where a legendary monster awaits. Disney animated prequel, which goes back in time to the ape man's childhood, with the voices of Harrison Chad, Ron Perlman, Glenn Close and Lance Henriksen.(n)

programme.title: Winnie the Pooh: Springtime with Roo
programme.desc: The gang's Easter celebrations come under threat when Rabbit grumpily refuses to join in, preferring to spend the day spring cleaning. Roo comes up with a plan to cheer him up and remind him that he used to love the holiday. Animated adventure, narrated by David Ogden Stiers and featuring the voices of Jim Cummings, Ken Sansom and Jimmy Bennett.(n)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure
programme.desc: The fairy and her friends work together to restore the source of their magical power and ensure the world's supply of pixie dust does not run out. However, when Tinker Bell accidentally jeopardises their plans, she must go on a dangerous quest to find a way of putting things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Anjelica Huston, Lucy Liu and Jane Horrocks.(n)

programme.title: Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: A downtrodden handyman is forced to look after his niece and nephew. He soon wins them over with his knack for telling exciting stories, but to their surprise the tall tales start coming true - and as the children make their own suggestions, the results become even more incredible. Fantasy comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce and Russell Brand.(n)

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.(n)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: A downtrodden handyman is forced to look after his niece and nephew. He soon wins them over with his knack for telling exciting stories, but to their surprise the tall tales start coming true - and as the children make their own suggestions, the results become even more incredible. Fantasy comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce and Russell Brand.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: The swashbuckling rogues join forces with old foe Barbossa to take on villainous Lord Beckett. But first they have to journey to the ends of the Earth to free Captain Jack Sparrow from his hellish imprisonment in Davy Jones' Locker. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley and Chow Yun-Fat, and featuring a cameo appearance by Keith Richards.(n)

programme.title: Disney's Kim Possible Movie: So the Drama
programme.desc: Feature length adventure of the animated series. The daring teenage heroine has to foil the evil Dr Drakken's fiendish plan to take over the world - but she also has to find a date for the prom. While she is delighted when the new boy at school asks her, her acceptance upsets her friend Ron, and prompts the pair to re-evaluate their feelings for each other. With the voice of Christy Carlson Romano and Will Friedle.(n)

programme.title: An Eskimo Tale
programme.desc: When animals start mysteriously disappearing, three young Inuits embark on a perilous journey to save their tribe from ruin. Animated adventure, with the voice of Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Prancer
programme.desc: A nine-year-old farm girl finds a wounded reindeer she is sure belongs to Father Christmas, and lovingly nurses it back to health. Although her innocent attempts to contact Santa about his missing animal embarrass her family, her gentle nature and determination eventually remind the local community just what Christmas is really all about. Drama, with Rebecca Harrell, Sam Elliott and Cloris Leachman.

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Lightning Thief
programme.desc: A teenager is shocked to discover he is the son of Greek god Poseidon and has been accused of stealing Zeus's lightning bolt. The youngster is given 14 days to find the culprit and return the missing item before the furious deity instigates an apocalyptic war. Fantasy adventure, starring Logan Lerman, Pierce Brosnan, Brandon T Jackson, Alexandra Daddario, Jake Abel, Sean Bean and Steve Coogan.

programme.title: The Dragon Spell
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on a quest to save the world of humans and the world of magic, with the aid of an aspiring wizard and feral wild child. Animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Viktor Andrienko, Kate Bristol and Allen Enlow.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A pair of fuzzy-headed trolls embark on a daring rescue mission when members of their tribe are kidnapped. Animation, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake.

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett.

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: The pig and his farmyard pals take a trip to the big city, where their curiosity and love of adventure lands them in trouble, leaving the courageous Babe to find a way to save his chums from danger. Family comedy sequel, starring Magda Szubanski, Mickey Rooney and James Cromwell, and featuring the voice of Elizabeth Daily as Babe.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.

programme.title: Trolls
